page.title: 16GAMES IN KILMARNOCK
page.content: These are the two most popular games that children play in New Farm. {SNOOKER-}To play Snooker you use a Snooker cue to hit a white ball which then hits a red ball. When the red ball is potted you try to pot a yellow, green, brown, blue, black or pink ball. Each colour of ball potted gets a different number of points ;e.g. red- 1, black- 7. The player with the most points at the end is the winner. {CODES-}To play codes you pick teams and one team is Runners and one team is Chasers. If the Chasers catch one of the Runners they tickle them to try to make the Runner tell one letter. When the Chasers have caught all the Runners, they jumble all the letters up to make a word. Then the Runners are Chasers and the Chasers are Runners.
